composition.spatial_depth: moderate depth with clear foreground focus
composition.scale_consistency: slightly larger perceived weight than normal items

grounding.method: subtle visual lift via glow or halo
grounding.shadow: none or extremely soft ambient shadow

lighting.highlighting: controlled specular highlights on key edges

textures.material_finish: polished or refined (stone, metal, crystal, lacquer)

render_quality.visual_clarity: icon reads as special even at small sizes

color_palette.usage: distinct color identity per rare item

accent_effects.glow: soft halo or inner glow (very subtle)
accent_effects.particles: none or extremely minimal (1–2 static spark hints max)

icon_behavior.interchangeability: visually stands above normal items, below rewards UI

ui_validation.rarity_test: must stand out next to normal craft items
ui_validation.restraint_test: must not overpower UI or feel flashy
ui_validation.consistency_test: all rare items feel equally valuable
